# Documentation

- [API Reference](/docs/api): Complete REST API documentation for PolicyFlow
- [Architecture](/docs/architecture): System design, data model, and request flow
- [Authentication](/docs/auth): How magic-link authentication works in PolicyFlow
- [Deployment](/docs/deployment): Deploy PolicyFlow with Docker, systemd, or behind a reverse proxy
- [Introduction](/docs): What is PolicyFlow and how does it work?
- [Quickstart](/docs/quickstart): Run PolicyFlow locally in under 5 minutes
- [Components](/docs/test): Components
